prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Did Stefan and his wife do anything together on the day of his birthday in 2024?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is the assembled list of relevant chart data from the horary chart provided. This compilation follows strict horary principles, addressing both your representation (Ascendant) and Stefan’s (via the 9th house, here containing his indicators):

1. Chart Foundations
 • Ascendant (Melissa): 18° Gemini
 • Chart structure is derived from a static horary chart drawn for the query “Did Stefan and his wife do anything together on his birthday in 2024?”
 • Stefan’s significator is identified by the 9th house (starting at 1° Aquarius) per the provided house cross-reference.

2. Planetary Positions (Degrees and Signs)
 • Sun: 17° Aquarius (located in the 9th house, supporting Stefan’s representation)
 • Moon: 22° Taurus (in the 12th house)
 • Mercury: 14° Aquarius (situated in the 9th house with the Sun and Pluto)
 • Venus: 1° Aries (in the 11th house)
 • Mars: 19° Cancer (retrograde, positioned in the 2nd house)
 • Jupiter: 11° Gemini (in the 12th house, conjoining with Uranus and Moon)
 • Saturn: 17° Pisces (in the 10th house)
 • Uranus: 23° Taurus (in the 12th house)
 • Neptune: 28° Pisces (in the 11th house)
 • Pluto: 2° Aquarius (in the 9th house)
 • North Node: 29° Pisces (retrograde, in the 11th house)
 • Chiron: 19° Aries (in the 11th house)

3. House Cusps (Key for Horary Analysis)
 • 1st House: Starts at 18° Gemini (Melissa’s domain)
 • 2nd House: Starts at 13° Cancer – contains Mars
 • 3rd House: Starts at 1° Leo
 • 4th House: Starts at 22° Leo
 • 5th House: Starts at 22° Virgo
 • 6th House: Starts at 8° Scorpio
 • 7th House: Starts at 18° Sagittarius
 • 8th House: Starts at 13° Capricorn
 • 9th House (Stefan’s significator): Starts at 1° Aquarius – contains Sun, Mercury, and Pluto
 • 10th House: Starts at 22° Aquarius – contains Saturn
 • 11th House: Starts at 22° Pisces – contains Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron
 • 12th House: Starts at 8° Taurus – contains Moon, Jupiter, and Uranus

4. Major Aspects
 • Mars square Chiron (orb: 0°)
 • Moon square IC and Moon square MC (orb: 0° for both)
 • MC opposition IC (orb: 0°)
 • Chiron sextile Ascendant (orb: 1°)
 • Venus sextile Pluto (orb: 1°)
 • Uranus square IC (orb: 1°); Uranus square MC (orb: 1°)
 • Saturn square Ascendant (orb: 1°)
 • Neptune conjunction North Node (orb: 1°)
 • Moon conjunction Uranus (orb: 1°)
 • Sun trine Ascendant (orb: 1°)
 • Sun sextile Chiron (orb: 2°)
 • Venus conjunction North Node (orb: 2°)
 • Mars trine Saturn (orb: 2°)
 • Chiron sextile MC (orb: 3°)
 • Pluto sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
 • Moon sextile Mars (orb: 3°)
 • Venus conjunction Neptune (orb: 3°)
 • Sun conjunction Mercury (orb: 3°)
 • Chiron trine IC (orb: 3°)
 • Mercury trine Jupiter (orb: 3°)
 • Ascendant sextile IC (orb: 4°)
 • Mars sextile Uranus (orb: 4°)
 • Ascendant trine MC (orb: 4°)
 • Mercury trine Ascendant (orb: 4°)
 • Uranus sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Mercury sextile Chiron (orb: 5°)
 • Moon sextile Saturn (orb: 5°)
 • Sun square Moon (orb: 5°)
 • Sun opposition IC (orb: 5°)
 • Sun conjunction MC (orb: 5°)
 • Saturn sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Moon sextile Neptune (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter square Saturn (orb: 6°)
 • Sun square Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Sun trine Jupiter (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter conjunction Ascendant (orb: 7°)
 • Mercury opposition IC (orb: 8°)
 • Mercury conjunction MC (orb: 8°)

5. Chart Patterns and Special Features
 • Patterns Identified:
  – T-Square comprising MC (22° Aquarius), Uranus (23° Taurus), IC (22° Leo), and Moon (22° Taurus) with Sun in Aquarius
  – Cradle consisting of Sun (17° Aquarius), IC (22° Leo), Ascendant (18° Gemini), Chiron (19° Aries), Mercury (14° Aquarius), and MC (22° Aquarius)
 • The Moon phase is a waxing gibbous
 • The chart displays a Bowl shape
 • There is a dominance of the Air element among the inner planets
 • Fixed modality is dominant among the inner planets
 • Notable quadrant distribution: the bottom right quadrant is empty while most planetary placements reside in the top left quadrant, with Jupiter “rising.”

6. Additional Timing and Dignity Indicators
 • Sun and Mercury are on the Midheaven, while the IC is on the Nadir, indicating a pronounced emphasis on matters related to personal identity versus external responsibilities.
 • The sextile aspect appears most frequently (13 occurrences), suggesting opportunities for communication and subtle support among the significators.
 • Specific horary timing can be further evaluated by considering the strength (or lack thereof) of the connections between Melissa’s Ascendant and Stefan’s 9th house indicators (the cluster in Aquarius: Sun, Mercury, Pluto).

This compilation is based exclusively on the horary chart data provided. Confirm that these are the elements you wish to have documented for the next stage of interpretation.

6. Additional Timing and Dignity Indicators
 • Sun and Mercury are on the Midheaven, while the IC is on the Nadir, indicating a pronounced emphasis on matters related to personal identity versus external responsibilities.
 • The sextile aspect appears most frequently (13 occurrences), suggesting opportunities for communication and subtle support among the significators.
 • Specific horary timing can be further evaluated by considering the strength (or lack thereof) of the connections between Melissa’s Ascendant and Stefan’s 9th house indicators (the cluster in Aquarius: Sun, Mercury, Pluto).

This compilation is based exclusively on the horary chart data provided. Confirm that these are the elements you wish to have documented for the next stage of interpretation.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Analyzing the horary formations step by step yields the following insights:

1. Stefan’s Significator (9th House Cluster)
• The 9th house holds Sun, Mercury, and Pluto in Aquarius. These planets emphasize Stefan’s independent, outward‐directed energy, mental agility, and a potential for transformative dynamics. Their concentrated presence suggests that Stefan’s personal agenda—and perhaps a wish for exploration or intellectual pursuits—was dominant on his birthday.

2. Domestic or Partnership Influences
• In traditional horary practice for partnership matters, the 7th house is examined. Using the cross‐reference guide, Stefan’s 7th house corresponds to Melissa’s 4th house cusp (at 22° Leo). The lack of significant planetary placements in this domain indicates that the household or domestic partnership indicator was relatively neutral or even weak on that day.
• With Leo ruling the 4th cusp, one might expect a strong, warm, and creative partner influence; however, its emptiness signals that such qualities were not actively engaged in the day’s events.

3. Aspects Involving Stefan’s Indicators and Related Tensions
• Several aspects point to tension in merging personal and domestic priorities. Notably, the Sun displays an opposition to the IC (orb 5°) and a square to the Moon (orb 5°), both of which highlight friction between outward expression and the foundations or home environment.
• The Moon—placed in Taurus in the 12th house—forms squares with both the IC and the MC (orb 0°), hinting at underlying discord within the private sphere.
• Saturn squares the Ascendant (orb 1°) and, along with Uranus’s challenging aspects, introduces restrictions and unpredictability that would inhibit smooth domestic interactions.

4. Additional Patterns and Their Implications
• A T-square involving the MC, Uranus, and IC—as well as a Cradle pattern centered on the Sun, Mercury, and the Ascendant/IC axis—reinforce the theme of inner tension. The dynamic, albeit unharmonious, configuration bolsters the notion that Stefan’s energies were diverted toward personal, even transformative, processes rather than cultivating domestic warmth.
• The abundance of sextile aspects (notably Sun and Mercury trining the Ascendant) could imply some readiness for communication. Yet these supportive aspects are overshadowed by the stronger oppositions and squares that signal internal conflict and misalignment between personal aspirations and domestic obligations.

5. Synthesis
• The clustering of Stefan’s active significators in the 9th house, combined with the absence or inactivity of pronounced indicators in the area representing the domestic partnership (via the 7th/4th house), suggests that Stefan’s birthday was marked by his independent pursuits rather than a cooperative, celebratory engagement with his wife.
• The tension stemming from the oppositions and squares—especially those involving the Moon and IC—points to an environment where the usual mutual domestic activities were either suppressed or compromised by personal, perhaps even unspoken, conflicts.

Based on these astrological elements and their traditional horary associations, the chart indicates that there was little evidence of a warm, reciprocal joint activity between Stefan and his wife on his birthday. The energies in play favored personal autonomy and signaled domestic discord rather than harmonious union on that particular day.
